atk-abh02a11:3_1: Idāni tadanantare jhānavibhaṅge yā tāva ayaṁ sakalassāpi suttantabhājanīyassa paṭhamaṁ mātikā ṭhapitā,
atk-abh02a11:3_2: tattha idhāti vacanaṁ pubbabhāgakaraṇīyasampadāya sampannassa sabbappakārajjhānanibbattakassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpanaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:3_11: Ācāragocarasampannoti idamassa heṭṭhā pātimokkhasaṁvarassa upari jhānānuyogassa ca upakāradhammaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:3_12: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti idamassa pātimokkhato acavanadhammatāparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:4_6: Bodhipakkhikānaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttoti idamassa paṭipattiyā nibbedhabhāgiyattaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:5_1: tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hotīti idamassa sabbattha satisampajaññasamannāgatattaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:5_2: So vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajatīti idamassa anurūpasenāsanapariggahaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:5_5: Soaraññagato vāti idamassa vuttappakārena senāsanena yuttabhāvaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:5_8: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāyātiādi panassa kammaṭṭhānānuyogena nīvaraṇappahānaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:5_9: Tasseva pahīnanīvaraṇassa vivicceva kāmehītiādi paṭipāṭiyā jhānuppattiparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:6_0: Api ca idha bhikkhūti imasmiṁ sāsane jhānuppādako bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a11:6_1: Idāni yasmā jhānuppādakena bhikkhunā cattāri sīlāni sodhetabbāni,
atk-abh02a11:6_4: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti iminā tesaṁ dvinnaṁ sīlānaṁ anavasesato ādānaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:6_7: Pubbarattāpararattantiādinā sīle patiṭṭhitassa jhānabhāvanāya upakārake dhamme.
atk-abh02a11:6_8: So abhikkantetiādinā tesaṁ dhammānaṁ aparihānāya kammaṭṭhānassa ca asammosāya satisampajaññasamāyogaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:6_10: Soaraññagato vātiādinā taṁ senāsanaṁ upagatassa jhānānurūpairiyāpathañceva jhānabhāvanārambhañca.
atk-abh02a11:6_12: So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyātiādinā evaṁ pahīnajjhānapaccanīkadhammassa sabbajjhānānaṁ uppattikkamaṁ upadisatīti.
atk-abh02a11:9_1: Idāni yathānikkhittaṁ mātikaṁ paṭipāṭiyā bhājetvā dassetuṁ idhāti imissā diṭṭhiyātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:9_2: Tattha imissā diṭṭhiyātiādīhi dasahi padehi sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṁ sabbaññubuddhasāsanameva kathitaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:9_3: Tañhi buddhena bhagavatā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhīti vuccati.
atk-abh02a11:10_10: dubbharatāya saṁvattanti no subharatāyā’ti ekaṁsena hi, gotami,
atk-abh02a11:12_0: Apicetaṁ sikkhāttayasaṅkhātaṁ sakalaṁ sāsanaṁ bhagavatā diṭṭhattā sammādiṭṭhipaccayattā sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamattā ca diṭṭhi,
atk-abh02a11:12_4: Attano kārakaṁ apāyesu apatamānaṁ dhāretīti dhammo.
atk-abh02a11:12_6: Dhammo ca so vinayo cāti dhammavinayo.
atk-abh02a11:12_7: Kusaladhammehi vā akusaladhammānaṁ esa vinayoti dhammavinayo.
atk-abh02a11:12_11: ‘ime dhammā virāgāya saṁvattanti no sarāgāya…pe… ekaṁsena, gotami,
atk-abh02a11:13_0: Dhammena vā vinayo, na daṇḍādīhīti dhammavinayo, vuttampi cetaṁ –
atk-abh02a11:18_11: Saṁsāradhammato hi sokādidhammato vā esa visiṭṭhaṁ nibbānaṁ nayati.
atk-abh02a11:18_16: Yasmā vā dhammāyeva abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā pahātabbā bhāvetabbā sacchikātabbā ca,
atk-abh02a11:18_20: Sātthasabyañjanatādīhi aññesaṁ vacanato padhānaṁ vacananti pavacanaṁ;
atk-abh02a11:18_25: “So vo mamaccayena satthā”ti hi dhammavinayova satthāti vuttoti evametesaṁ padānaṁ attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:19_0: Yasmā pana imasmiṁyeva sāsane sabbapakārajjhānanibbattako bhikkhu dissati,
atk-abh02a11:19_2: tasmā tattha tattha ‘imissā’ti ca ‘imasmi’nti ca ayaṁ niyamo katoti veditabboti.
atk-abh02a11:20_3: Samaññāya eva hi ekacco bhikkhūti paññāyati.
atk-abh02a11:20_4: Tathā hi nimantanādimhi bhikkhūsu gaṇīyamānesu sāmaṇerepi gahetvā ‘sataṁ bhikkhū,
atk-abh02a11:20_10: Ayaṁ pana ānandattherena vuttattā dhammikā paṭiññā.
atk-abh02a11:20_11: Rattibhāge pana dussīlāpi paṭipathaṁ āgacchantā “ko etthā”ti vutte adhammikāya paṭiññāya abhūtatthāya “mayaṁ bhikkhū”ti vadanti.
atk-abh02a11:21_3: so taṁ labhatu vā mā vā,
atk-abh02a11:21_7: Bhikkhācariyaṁ ajjhupagatoti buddhādīhi ajjhupagataṁ bhikkhācariyaṁ ajjhupagatattā bhikkhācariyaṁ ajjhupagato nāma.
atk-abh02a11:21_8: Yo hi koci appaṁ vā mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ pahāya agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito,
atk-abh02a11:21_9: kasigorakkhādīhi jīvitakappanaṁ hitvā liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva bhikkhācariyaṁ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a11:21_10: Parappaṭibaddhajīvikattā vā vihāramajjhe kājabhattaṁ bhuñjamānopi bhikkhācariyaṁ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a11:21_11: Piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṁ nissāya pabbajjāya ussāhajātattā vā bhikkhācariyaṁ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a11:22_2: Sahassagghanakopi hi paṭo satthakena khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṁ chinno bhinnaggho hoti,
atk-abh02a11:22_5: Sukhasamphassopi hi paṭo suttehi saṁsibbito bhinnaphasso hoti,
atk-abh02a11:22_8: Suparisuddhopi hi paṭo sūcikammato paṭṭhāya sūcimalena,
atk-abh02a11:22_13: Gihīvatthavisabhāgānaṁ vā kāsāvānaṁ dhāraṇamatteneva bhinnapaṭadharoti bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a11:23_7: Sotāpanno hi sotāpattimaggena pañca kilese bhinditvā ṭhito.
atk-abh02a11:23_10: arahā arahattamaggena aṭṭha kilese bhinditvā ṭhito.
atk-abh02a11:23_11: Evamayaṁ catubbidho phalaṭṭho bhinnattā pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ bhikkhu nāma.
atk-abh02a11:24_0: Odhiso kilesānaṁ pahānāti ettha dve odhī –
atk-abh02a11:24_3: Tattha sotāpanno maggodhinā odhiso kilesānaṁ pahānā bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a11:24_4: Tassa hi catūsu maggesu ekeneva odhinā kilesā pahīnā,
atk-abh02a11:24_7: Sotāpanno ca kilesodhināpi odhiso kilesānaṁ pahānā bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a11:24_8: Tassa hi pahātabbakilesesu odhināva kilesā pahīnā,
atk-abh02a11:24_10: Arahā pana anodhisova kilesānaṁ pahānā bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a11:24_11: Tassa hi maggacatukkena anodhināva kilesā pahīnā,
atk-abh02a11:24_14: Ekāpi hi kilesasīmā ṭhitā nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a11:24_15: Evaṁ so ubhayathāpi anodhiso kilesānaṁ pahānā bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a11:25_2: Tesu yo koci sekkho bhikkhuti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:25_4: Sekkhadhamme atikkamma aggaphale ṭhito tato uttari sikkhitabbābhāvato khīṇāsavo asekkhoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a11:25_5: Avaseso puthujjanabhikkhu tisso sikkhā neva sikkhati,
atk-abh02a11:26_0: Sīlaggaṁ samādhiggaṁ paññaggaṁ vimuttagganti idaṁ aggaṁ patvā ṭhitattā aggo bhikkhu nāma.
atk-abh02a11:26_2: Kalyāṇaputhujjanādayo hi yāva arahā tāva bhadrena sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena
atk-abh02a11:26_3: ca samannāgatattā bhadro bhikkhūti saṅkhyaṁ gacchanti.
atk-abh02a11:27_0: Tattha ca “bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhu,
atk-abh02a11:27_2: sekkho bhikkhū”ti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu satta sekkhā kathitā.
atk-abh02a11:27_7: maṇḍo bhikkhū”ti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu khīṇāsavova kathito.
atk-abh02a11:28_0: Evaṁ samaññādīhi bhikkhuṁ dassetvā idāni upasampadāvasena dassetuṁ samaggena saṅghenātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a11:28_1: Tattha samaggena saṅghenāti sabbantimena paricchedena pañcavaggakaraṇīye kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā,
atk-abh02a11:28_2: tesaṁ āgatattā chandārahānaṁ chandassa āhaṭattā sammukhībhūtānañca appaṭikkosanato ekasmiṁ kamme samaggabhāvaṁ upagatena.
atk-abh02a11:28_3: Ñatticatutthenāti tīhi anussāvanāhi ekāya ca ñattiyā kātabbena.
atk-abh02a11:29_3: Tañcesa yathāvuttena kammena samāpannattā upasampannoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a11:29_16: Tāsu upasampadāsu imasmiṁ ṭhāne ayaṁ ñatticatutthakammūpasampadāva adhippetā.
atk-abh02a11:30_6: Tattha sīlanti kāmañcetaṁ saha kammavācāpariyosānena ijjhanakassa pātimokkhassa vevacanaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:30_7: evaṁ santepi dhammato etaṁ sīlaṁ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattappaṭipattiṁ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a11:31_0: Tattha cetanā sīlaṁ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṁ vā pūrentassa cetanā.
atk-abh02a11:31_1: Cetasikaṁ sīlaṁ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa virati.
atk-abh02a11:31_2: Apica cetanā sīlaṁ nāma pāṇātipātādīni pajahantassa satta kammapathacetanā.
atk-abh02a11:31_3: Cetasikaṁ sīlaṁ nāma “abhijjhaṁ pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharatī”tiādinā nayena saṁyuttamahāvagge vuttā anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā.
atk-abh02a11:31_4: Saṁvaro sīlanti ettha pañcavidhena saṁvaro veditabbo –
atk-abh02a11:31_12: Ettha ca saṁvarasīlaṁ avītikkamasīlanti idameva nippariyāyato sīlaṁ;
atk-abh02a11:31_13: cetanā sīlaṁ cetasikaṁ sīlanti pariyāyato sīlanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:32_0: Yasmā pana pātimokkhasaṁvarasīlena bhikkhu sāsane patiṭṭhāti nāma,
atk-abh02a11:32_3: kusaladhammā eva vā ettha patiṭṭhahantīti patiṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a11:33_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṁ paññañca bhāvayaṁ;
atk-abh02a11:34_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti ca. ;
atk-abh02a11:35_1: sīlaṁ sabbesaṁ kusaladhammāna”nti ca “sīle patiṭṭhitassa kho, mahārāja,
atk-abh02a11:35_2: sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī”ti ca ādisuttavasena veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:38_0: Yathā hi nagaravaḍḍhakī nagaraṁ māpetukāmo paṭhamaṁ nagaraṭṭhānaṁ sodheti,
atk-abh02a11:38_1: tato aparabhāge vīthicatukkasiṅghāṭakādiparicchedena vibhajitvā nagaraṁ māpeti;
atk-abh02a11:38_4: Yathā vā pana rajako paṭhamaṁ tīhi khārehi vatthaṁ dhovitvā parisuddhe vatthe yadicchakaṁ raṅgajātaṁ upaneti;
atk-abh02a11:38_5: yathā vā pana cheko cittakāro rūpaṁ likhitukāmo āditova bhittiparikammaṁ karoti,
atk-abh02a11:38_7: evameva yogāvacaro āditova sīlaṁ visodhetvā aparabhāge samathavipassanādayo dhamme sacchikaroti.
atk-abh02a11:39_2: Yathā hi chinnacaraṇassa purisassa disaṁgamanābhisaṅkhāro na jāyati,
atk-abh02a11:39_4: evameva yassa sīlaṁ bhinnaṁ hoti khaṇḍaṁ aparipuṇṇaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:39_6: Yassa pana taṁ abhinnaṁ hoti akkhaṇḍaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ tassa nibbānagamanāya ñāṇagamanaṁ sampajjati.
atk-abh02a11:40_2: Ubhayenāpi sīlasaṁyamo ceva sīlasaṁvaro ca kathito.
atk-abh02a11:40_5: vītikkamavasena tassa vipphandituṁ na detīti saṁyamo.
atk-abh02a11:40_8: Yathā hi sattānaṁ catubbidho āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgamaṅgāni pharati,
atk-abh02a11:40_9: evaṁ yoginopi catubhūmakakusalaṁ sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṁ sampādeti.
atk-abh02a11:40_13: Kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samāpattiyāti catubhūmakakusalānaṁ paṭilābhatthāya pāmokkhaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ seṭṭhaṁ padhānanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:41_6: Yathā hi saṁvutadvāraṁ gehaṁ “saṁvutagehaṁ pihitageha”nti vuccati,
atk-abh02a11:42_0: 512.Iriyatītiādīhi sattahipi padehi pātimokkhasaṁvarasīle ṭhitassa bhikkhuno iriyāpathavihāro kathito.
atk-abh02a11:43_1: Ācāragocaraniddese kiñcāpi bhagavā samaṇācaraṁ samaṇagocaraṁ kathetukāmo “ācāragocarasampannoti atthi ācāro,
atk-abh02a11:43_3: Yathā pana maggakusalo puriso maggaṁ acikkhanto ‘vāmaṁ muñca dakkhiṇaṁ gaṇhā’ti paṭhamaṁ muñcitabbaṁ sabhayamaggaṁ uppathamaggaṁ ācikkhati,
atk-abh02a11:43_5: evameva maggakusalapurisasadiso dhammarājā paṭhamaṁ pahātabbaṁ buddhappaṭikuṭṭhaṁ anācāraṁ ācikkhitvā
atk-abh02a11:43_7: Purisena hi ācikkhitamaggo sampajjeyya vā na vā,
atk-abh02a11:44_0: Yasmā vā sasīsaṁ nahānena pahīnasedamalajallikassa purisassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanavidhānaṁ viya
atk-abh02a11:44_2: tasmā sedamalajallikkaṁ viya pahātabbaṁ paṭhamaṁ anācāraṁ ācikkhitvā,
atk-abh02a11:44_3: pahīnasedamalajallikassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanavidhānaṁ viya pacchā ācāraṁ ācikkhitukāmopi tattha katamo anācārotiādimāha.
atk-abh02a11:45_0: Yasmā pana na kevalaṁ kāyavācāhi eva anācāraṁ ācarati,
atk-abh02a11:45_2: tasmā taṁ dassetuṁ “sabbampi dussīlyaṁ anācāro”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:45_3: Tattha ekacciyaṁ anācāraṁ vibhajitvā dassento idhekacco veḷudānenātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a11:45_5: Vihāre uṭṭhitañhi araññato vā āharitvā rakkhitagopitaṁ veḷuṁ ‘evaṁ me paccayaṁ dassantī’ti upaṭṭhākānaṁ dātuṁ na vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a11:45_6: Evañhi jīvitaṁ kappento anesanāya micchājīvena jīvati.
atk-abh02a11:45_12: Sace pana taṁ issaravatāya deti garubhaṇḍavissajjanamāpajjati.
atk-abh02a11:46_6: So pana pamāṇena paricchinno telanāḷippamāṇopi garubhaṇḍaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:46_8: Yassa pana bhikkhuno telanāḷiyā vā kattaradaṇḍena vā attho,
atk-abh02a11:46_10: Phātikammaṁ tadagghanakaṁ vā atirekaṁ vā vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a11:46_12: Hatthakammampi udakāharaṇamattaṁ vā appaharitakaraṇamattaṁ vā na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a11:46_14: Tasmā pokkharaṇito vā paṁsuṁ uddharitvā sopānaṁ vā attharāpetvā visamaṭṭhānaṁ vā samaṁ katvā gahetuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a11:46_15: Phātikammaṁ akatvā gahito tattha vasanteneva paribhuñjitabbo;
atk-abh02a11:46_17: Asatiyā gahetvā gatena yattha gato sarati,
atk-abh02a11:47_2: Manussā punappunaṁ yācanti vā tajjenti vā.
atk-abh02a11:47_3: Tadā bhikkhūhi ‘daṇḍakammaṁ katvā gaṇhathā’ti vattuṁ vaṭṭati;
atk-abh02a11:47_5: Sace te daṇḍakammatthāya vāsipharasuādīni vā khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ vā denti,
atk-abh02a11:47_7: Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana “daḍḍhagehā manussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na vāretabbā”ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:48_4: Sace koṭṭetuṁ na icchanti ‘samabhāgaṁ labhissathā’ti vattabbā;
atk-abh02a11:48_14: Saṅghike rukkhe koṭṭāpetvā saṅghaṁ anāpucchitvāpi saṅghikaṁ āvāsaṁ kātuṁ labbhati.
atk-abh02a11:49_3: Hatthakammasīsena pana ekasmiṁ gehe mañcaṭṭhānamattaṁ labbhati,
atk-abh02a11:49_9: Saṅghikarukkhe saṅghikaṁ āvāsaṁ bādhente saṅghaṁ anāpucchā hāretuṁ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a11:49_12: Sace rukkhaṁ nissāya saṅghassa mahanto lābho hoti,
atk-abh02a11:49_14: Puggalikarukkhe saṅghikaṁ āvāsaṁ bādhente rukkhasāmikassa ācikkhitabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:49_17: ‘Rukkhaṁ me dethā’ti codentassa rukkhaṁ agghāpetvā mūlaṁ dātabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:49_19: puggalike ca puggalikāvāsaṁ bādhentepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a11:49_25: tato heṭṭhā vallikhaṇḍaṁ garubhaṇḍaṁ na hoti.
atk-abh02a11:50_0: Pattadānādīsupi pattadānenāti paccayahetukena pattadānenātiādi sabbaṁ veḷudāne vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:51_1: Tālapaṇṇampi hi sayaṁjāte tālavane saṅghena paricchinnaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:51_6: Yattha pana tiṇaṁ natthi tattha muñjapalālanāḷikerapaṇṇādīhipi chādenti.
atk-abh02a11:51_9: nāḷikerapaṇṇādīsu ca ekapaṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṁ vā tatthajātakaṁ vā bahiārāme saṅghassa tiṇavatthumhi jātatiṇaṁ vā rakkhitagopitaṁ garubhaṇḍaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a11:51_10: Taṁ pana saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṁ puggalikakamme dātuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a11:52_0: Pupphadāne “ettakesu rukkhesu pupphāni vissajjetvā yāgubhattavatthe upanentu,
atk-abh02a11:52_1: ettakesu senāsanapaṭisaṅkharaṇe upanentū”ti evaṁ niyamitaṭṭhāne eva pupphāni garubhaṇḍāni honti.
atk-abh02a11:52_2: Paratīre sāmaṇerā pupphāni ocinitvā rāsiṁ karonti,
atk-abh02a11:52_3: pañcaṅgasamannāgato pupphabhājako bhikkhusaṅghaṁ gaṇetvā koṭṭhāse karoti,
atk-abh02a11:52_4: so sampattaparisāya saṅghaṁ anāpucchitvāva dātuṁ labhati;
atk-abh02a11:52_6: Bhikkhu pana kassa pupphāni dātuṁ labhati,
atk-abh02a11:52_8: Mātāpitūnaṁ gehaṁ haritvāpi gehato pakkosāpetvāpi ‘vatthupūjaṁ karothā’ti dātuṁ labhati,
atk-abh02a11:52_15: Bhikkhunā piṇḍāya carantena manusse disvā ‘vihāre bahūni pupphāni,
atk-abh02a11:52_18: ‘Manussā khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ ādāya āgamissantī’ti cittena pana na vattabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:52_21: Manussā attano dhammatāya ‘vihāre pupphāni atthī’ti pucchitvā ‘asukadivase vihāraṁ āgamissāma,
atk-abh02a11:52_22: sāmaṇerānaṁ pupphāni ocinituṁ mā dethā’ti vadanti.
atk-abh02a11:53_0: Aparo bhikkhu sāmaṇerānaṁ ācikkhati “asukagāmavāsino pupphāni mā ocinitthā”ti āhaṁsūti.
atk-abh02a11:53_1: Manussāpi āmisaṁ āharitvā dānaṁ datvā vadanti –
atk-abh02a11:53_3: sāmaṇere amhehi saha pupphāni ocinituṁ āṇāpethā”ti.
atk-abh02a11:53_8: Ettakaṁ nayaṁ labhitvā sāmaṇere putte vā bhātike vā katvā pupphāni ocināpetuṁ doso natthi;
atk-abh02a11:54_0: Phaladāne phalampi pupphaṁ viya niyamitameva garubhaṇḍaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a11:54_1: Vihāre bahukamhi phalāphale sati aphāsukamanussā āgantvā yācanti.
atk-abh02a11:54_5: Phalehi vā rukkhehi vā paricchinditvā katikā kātabbā –
atk-abh02a11:54_7: ettakesu vā rukkhesu phalāni gaṇhantā na vāretabbā’ti.
atk-abh02a11:54_8: Corā pana issarā vā balakkārena gaṇhantā na vāretabbā;
atk-abh02a11:55_7: Sāpi heṭṭhimakoṭiyā tiṁsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇāva tato heṭṭhā na garubhaṇḍanti.
atk-abh02a11:56_2: te attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṁ pāṭiyekkaṁ dātuṁ na labhanti.
atk-abh02a11:56_3: Yehi pana ‘ettakāni dantakaṭṭhāni āharitabbānī’ti paricchinditvā vāraṁ gahitāni,
atk-abh02a11:56_5: Ekena bhikkhunā dantakaṭṭhamāḷakato bahūni dantakaṭṭhāni na gahetabbāni,
atk-abh02a11:56_7: Pāṭiyekkaṁ vasantenāpi bhikkhusaṅghaṁ gaṇayitvā yattakāni attano pāpuṇanti tattakāneva gahetvā gantabbaṁ;
atk-abh02a11:56_8: antarā āgantukesu vā āgatesu disaṁ vā pakkamantena āharitvā gahitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetabbāni.
atk-abh02a11:57_0: Cāṭukamyatāyātiādīsu cāṭukamyatā vuccati attānaṁ dāsaṁ viya nīcaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā parassa khalitavacanampi saṇṭhapetvā piyakāmatāya paggayhavacanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:57_2: Yathā hi muggasūpe paccante bahū muggā pākaṁ gacchanti,
atk-abh02a11:57_4: evameva saccālikena jīvitakappake puggale bahu alikaṁ hoti,
atk-abh02a11:57_6: Yathā vā muggasūpassa appavisanaṭṭhānaṁ nāma natthi,
atk-abh02a11:57_7: evameva saccālikavuttino puggalassa appaviṭṭhavācā nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a11:58_0: Jaṅghapesanikanti gāmantaradesantarādīsu tesaṁ tesaṁ gihīnaṁ sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:58_3: tesaṁ sāsanaṁ gahetvā katthaci gamanavasena vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a11:58_4: Cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā attano vā kammaṁ karontānaṁ vaḍḍhakīnampi sāsanaṁ harituṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a11:58_8: “asukattherassa nāma dethā”ti piṇḍapātaṁ vā bhesajjaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā denti;
atk-abh02a11:58_9: “vihāre pūjaṁ karothā”ti mālāgandhavilepanādīni vā dhajapatākādīni vā nīyyādenti,
atk-abh02a11:58_12: Sesānaṁ sāsanaṁ gahetvā gacchantassa padavāre padavāre doso.
atk-abh02a11:59_0: Aññataraññatarenāti etesaṁ vā veḷudānādīnaṁ aññataraññatarena vejjakammabhaṇḍāgārikakammaṁ piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍakammaṁ
atk-abh02a11:59_1: saṅghuppādacetiyuppādaupaṭṭhāpanakammanti evarūpānaṁ vā micchājīvena jīvitakappanakakammānaṁ yena kenaci.
atk-abh02a11:59_3: Ayaṁ vuccatīti ayaṁ sabbopi anācāro nāma kathīyati.
atk-abh02a11:60_1: Gocaraniddesepi paṭhamaṁ agocarassa vacane kāraṇaṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:60_2: Tattha ca gocaroti piṇḍapātādīnaṁ atthāya upasaṅkamituṁ yuttaṭṭhānaṁ gocaro,
atk-abh02a11:60_6: Tattha vesiyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyo yena kenacideva sulabhajjhācāratāmittasatthavasinehavasena upasaṅkamanto vesiyāgocaro nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:60_10: Evaṁ upasaṅkamantassa hi ciraṁ rakkhitagopitopi samaṇadhammo katipāheneva nassati;
atk-abh02a11:60_12: Dakkhiṇāvasena pana upasaṅkamantena satiṁ upaṭṭhāpetvā upasaṅkamitabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:60_13: Vidhavā vuccanti matapatikā vā pavutthapatikā vā.
atk-abh02a11:60_16: Tesaṁ sabbesampi upasaṅkamane ādīnavo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:60_20: Te aññamaññaṁ santhavavasena katipāheneva rakkhitagopitasamaṇadhammaṁ nāsenti.
atk-abh02a11:60_22: Bhikkhunā pupphāni labhitvā pūjanatthāyapi ovādadānatthāyapi gantuṁ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-abh02a11:61_2: Tattha tehi saddhiṁ saha soṇḍavasena upasaṅkamituṁ na vaṭṭati;
atk-abh02a11:61_4: Saṁsaṭṭho viharati rājūhītiādīsu rājānoti abhisittā vā hontu anabhisittā vā ye rajjaṁ anusāsanti.
atk-abh02a11:61_5: Rājamahāmattāti rājūnaṁ issariyasadisāya mahatiyā issariyamattāya samannāgatā.
atk-abh02a11:62_0: Ananulomikena saṁsaggenāti ananulomikasaṁsaggo nāma tissannaṁ sikkhānaṁ ananulomo paccanīkasaṁsaggo,
atk-abh02a11:62_7: titthiyatitthiyasāvakehi saddhiṁ ekacchandarucisamācāratā ekacchandarucisamācārabhāvāvaho vā sinehabahumānasanthavo.
atk-abh02a11:62_8: Tattha rājarājamahāmattehi saddhiṁ saṁsaggo brahmacariyantarāyaṁ karoti.
atk-abh02a11:62_10: Tesaṁ pana vādaṁ bhinditvā attano laddhiṁ gaṇhāpetuṁ samatthena upasaṅkamituṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a11:63_0: Idāni aparenapi pariyāyena agocaraṁ dassetuṁ yāni vā pana tāni kulānītiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:63_5: Appasannānīti cittaṁ pasannaṁ anāvilaṁ kātuṁ na sakkonti.
atk-abh02a11:63_6: Akkosakaparibhāsakānīti akkosakāni ceva paribhāsakāni ca; ‘corosi, bālosi, mūḷhosi, oṭṭhosi, goṇosi,
atk-abh02a11:63_12: duggatiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā’ti evaṁ dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanti; ‘hotu,
atk-abh02a11:63_15: vadhissāmā’ti evaṁ bhayadassanena paribhāsanti cāti attho.
atk-abh02a11:63_22: Ayogakkhemakāmānīti catūhi yogehi khemaṁ nibbhayaṁ na icchanti,
atk-abh02a11:63_26: Sabbesampi hi bhagavantaṁ uddissa pabbajitānañceva saraṇagatānañca catunnampi parisānaṁ tāni anatthakāmāniyeva.
atk-abh02a11:63_33: assaddhakulādisevakassa assaddhakulādiko cāti tippakāropi ayuttagocaro agocaroti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:64_1: Vesiyādiko tāva pañcakāmaguṇanissayato agocaroti veditabbo, yathāha – “ko ca,
atk-abh02a11:64_4: Yadidaṁ pañca kāmaguṇā”ti rājādiko jhānānuyogassa anupanissayato lābhasakkārāsanicakkanipphādanato diṭṭhivipattihetuto ca,
atk-abh02a11:65_6: Gharadvāraṁ sampattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paccayavekallaṁ nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a11:65_8: Kāsāvapajjotānīti bhikkhubhikkhunīhi nivatthapārutānaṁ kāsāvānaṁyeva pabhāya ekobhāsāni bhūtapālaseṭṭhikulasadisāni.
atk-abh02a11:65_9: Isivātapaṭivātānīti gehaṁ pavisantānaṁ nikkhamantānañca bhikkhubhikkhunīsaṅkhātānaṁ isīnaṁ cīvaravātena
atk-abh02a11:65_10: ceva samiñjanapasāraṇādijanitasarīravātena ca paṭivātāni pavāyitāni viniddhutakibbisāni vā.
atk-abh02a11:66_2: Yāni tāni vajjānīti yāni tāni garahitabbaṭṭhena vajjāni.
atk-abh02a11:66_13: “anāpattigamanīyāni cittuppādamattakāni yāni ‘na puna evarūpaṁ karissāmī’ti manasā āvajjitamatteneva sujjhanti.
atk-abh02a11:66_17: Tasmā sabbalahukaṁ dukkaṭadubbhāsitaṁ idha vajjanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:66_21: Bhayadassāvīti catubbidhassa bhayassa kāraṇattā bhayato dassanasīlo.
atk-abh02a11:66_25: vippaṭisārajananato ca etena nānappakārena ādīnavato dassanasīlo.
atk-abh02a11:67_0: Nissaraṇadassāvīti yaṁ tattha nissaraṇaṁ tassa dassanasīlo.
atk-abh02a11:67_2: Ācariyattheravāde tāva “anāpattigamanīyatāya sati adhiṭṭhānāvikammaṁ nissaraṇa”nti kathitaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:67_3: Antevāsikattheravāde tāva “āpattigamanīyatāya sati vuṭṭhānāvikammaṁ nissaraṇa”nti kathitaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:68_0: Tattha tathārūpo bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjato bhayato passati nāma.
atk-abh02a11:68_14: Tattha ‘paramāṇu’ nāma ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko maṁsacakkhussa āpāthaṁ nāgacchati,
atk-abh02a11:68_16: ‘Aṇu’ nāma bhitticchiddatālacchiddehi paviṭṭhasūriyarasmīsu vaṭṭi vaṭṭi hutvā paribbhamanto paññāyati.
atk-abh02a11:68_17: ‘Tajjārī’ nāma gopathamanussapathacakkapathesu chijjitvā ubhosu passesu uggantvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-abh02a11:68_20: Etesu pana chattiṁsa paramāṇavo ekassa aṇuno pamāṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:68_34: Yo bhikkhu aṇumattaṁ vajjaṁ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatasadisaṁ katvā daṭṭhuṁ sakkoti –
atk-abh02a11:68_35: ayaṁ bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni bhayato passati nāma.
atk-abh02a11:68_36: Yopi bhikkhu sabbalahukaṁ dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattaṁ paṭhamapārājikasadisaṁ katvā daṭṭhuṁ sakkoti –
atk-abh02a11:68_37: ayaṁ aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjato bhayato passati nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:69_1: Sā bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇāpi asādhāraṇāpi bhikkhusikkhā eva nāma.
atk-abh02a11:69_3: Sāpi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇāpi asādhāraṇāpi bhikkhunīsikkhā eva nāma.
atk-abh02a11:69_9: Tattha bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhā yāva arahattamaggā vaṭṭati.
atk-abh02a11:69_11: Tatrāyaṁ bhikkhu attanā sikkhitabbasikkhāpadesu eva sikkhati.
atk-abh02a11:69_12: Sesasikkhā pana atthuddhāravasena sikkhāpadassa atthadassa dassanatthaṁ vuttā.
atk-abh02a11:69_13: Iti imāsu sikkhāsūti evaṁpakārāsu etāsu sikkhāsu.
atk-abh02a11:69_14: Sabbena sabbanti sabbena sikkhāsamādānena sabbaṁ sikkhaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:69_15: Sabbathā sabbanti sabbena sikkhitabbākārena sabbaṁ sikkhaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:69_17: satisammosena bhinnassāpi sikkhāpadassa puna pākatikakaraṇato nissesaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:69_19: Tena vuccatīti yena kāraṇena etaṁ sabbaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ sabbena sikkhitabbākārena samādiyitvā sikkhati pūreti,
atk-abh02a11:70_0: 517-8.Indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññūtipadadvayassa niddese kaṇhapakkhassa paṭhamavacane payojanaṁ ācāraniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:70_1: Tattha katamā indriyesu aguttadvāratātiādīsu pana yaṁ vattabbaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:71_0: 519.Jāgariyānuyoganiddese pubbarattāpararattanti ettha aḍḍharattasaṅkhātāya rattiyā pubbe pubbarattaṁ;
atk-abh02a11:71_4: Majjhimayāmo panassa bhikkhuno niddākilamathavinodanokāsoti na gahito.
atk-abh02a11:71_6: Anuyutto hotīti taṁ anuyogasaṅkhātaṁ āsevanaṁ bhāvanaṁ anuyutto hoti sampayutto.
atk-abh02a11:71_7: Niddese panassa idha bhikkhu divasanti pubbaṇho,
atk-abh02a11:71_10: Caṅkamena nisajjāyāti sakalampi divasaṁ iminā iriyāpathadvayeneva viharanto.
atk-abh02a11:71_11: Cittassa āvaraṇato āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi pañcahipi nīvaraṇehi sabbākusaladhammehi vā cittaṁ parisodheti.
atk-abh02a11:72_6: kāmabhogī vāmena passena sentī”ti ayaṁ kāmabhogīseyyā.
atk-abh02a11:72_7: Tesu hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a11:72_11: appamaṁsalohitattā hi aṭṭhisaṅghāṭajaṭitā ekena passena sayituṁ na sakkonti,
atk-abh02a11:72_16: tejussadattā hi sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṁ ṭhāne dve pacchimapāde ekasmiṁ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṁ
atk-abh02a11:72_17: antarasatthimhi pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṁ ṭhitokāsaṁ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṁ purimapādānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:72_19: divasampi sayitvā pabujjhamāno na uttasanto pabujjhati,
atk-abh02a11:72_20: sīsaṁ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṁ ṭhitokāsaṁ sallakkheti;
atk-abh02a11:72_21: sace kiñci ṭhānaṁ vijahitvā ṭhitaṁ hoti ‘nayidaṁ tuyhaṁ jātiyā na sūrabhāvassa anurūpa’nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati,
atk-abh02a11:72_23: avijahitvā ṭhite pana ‘tuyhaṁ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida’nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṁ
atk-abh02a11:72_24: vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṁ vidhunitvā tikkhattuṁ sīhanādaṁ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati.
atk-abh02a11:73_1: Accādhāyāti atiādhāya īsakaṁ atikkamma ṭhapetvā gopphakena hi gopphake jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṁ vedanā uppajjati,
atk-abh02a11:73_9: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ceva sampajānapaññāya ca samannāgato hutvā.
atk-abh02a11:73_11: Uṭṭhānasaññaṁ manasikaritvāti asukavelāya nāma uṭṭhahissāmī’ti evaṁ uṭṭhānavelāparicchedakaṁ uṭṭhānasaññaṁ citte upetvā.
atk-abh02a11:73_12: Evaṁ katvā nipanno hi yathāparicchinnakāleyeva uṭṭhātuṁ yutto.
atk-abh02a11:74_0: 520-521.Sātaccaṁ nepakkanti satataṁ pavattayitabbato sātaccasaṅkhātaṁ vīriyañceva paripākagatattā nepakkasaṅkhātaṁ
atk-abh02a11:74_1: paññañca yutto anuyutto pavattayamānoyeva jāgariyānuyogaṁ anuyutto viharatīti attho.
atk-abh02a11:75_1: Ettāvatā sabbepi sattatiṁsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme samūhato gahetvā lokiyāyapi bhāvanāya ekārammaṇe ekato
atk-abh02a11:76_1: Abhikkantetiādiniddese abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha tāva abhikkantaṁ vuccati purato gamanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:76_4: Gamane tāva purato kāyaṁ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-abh02a11:76_6: Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṁ purato onāmento abhikkamati nāma,
atk-abh02a11:76_8: Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova āsannassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṁsaranto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-abh02a11:77_4: Taṁ pana sampajaññaṁ yasmā satisampayuttameva hoti,
atk-abh02a11:78_0: Ayañhi abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā na muṭṭhassatī asampajāno hoti;
atk-abh02a11:78_1: satiyā pana samannāgato paññāya ca sampajānoyeva abhikkamati ceva paṭikkamati ca;
atk-abh02a11:78_8: Tattha abhikkamanacitte uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā ‘kinnu me ettha gatena attho atthi,
atk-abh02a11:78_11: Cetiyaṁ vā bodhiṁ vā disvāpi hi buddhārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ,
atk-abh02a11:78_12: saṅghadassanena saṅghārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a11:78_14: asubhaṁ disvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṁ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a11:79_0: Tasmiṁ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṁ pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṁ ‘sappāyasampajaññaṁ’,
atk-abh02a11:79_3: Sace pana cetiyassa mahatiyā pūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare parisā sannipatanti,
atk-abh02a11:79_4: attano vibhavānurūpaṁ itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni viya sañcaranti,
atk-abh02a11:79_14: Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṁ kāretvā sabbarattiṁ dhammassavanaṁ karontesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca hoti.
atk-abh02a11:80_2: eko kira daharabhikkhu sāmaṇeraṁ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato.
atk-abh02a11:80_3: Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto asubhaṁ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṁ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṁ katvā
atk-abh02a11:80_4: saṅkhāre sammasanto tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṁ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh02a11:80_6: So ‘mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā saddhiṁ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā,
atk-abh02a11:80_10: iminā tāva maggena gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṁ puratthābhimukho ṭhatvā olokethā”ti āha.
atk-abh02a11:80_11: So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi.
atk-abh02a11:80_12: Evaṁ ekaṁ asubhaṁ dvinnaṁ janānaṁ atthāya jātaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:80_13: Evaṁ sātthampi panetaṁ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṁ asappāyaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:81_0: Evaṁ pariggahitasātthasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṁsāya kammaṭṭhānesu attano cittaruciyaṁ kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṁ
atk-abh02a11:81_1: gocaraṁ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṁ gahetvāva gamanaṁ ‘gocarasampajaññaṁ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a11:82_2: ekacco pana neva harati na paccāharati,
atk-abh02a11:82_4: Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodhetvā,
atk-abh02a11:82_5: tathā rattiyā paṭhamayāme majjhimayāme seyyaṁ kappetvā pacchimayāmepi nisajjācaṅkamehi vītināmetvā pageva
atk-abh02a11:82_6: cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṁ katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṁ āsiñcitvā pānīyaṁ paribhojanīyaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā
atk-abh02a11:82_8: so sarīraparikammaṁ katvā senāsanaṁ pavisitvā dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṁ gāhāpento kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjitvā,
atk-abh02a11:82_9: bhikkhācāravelāya uṭṭhahitvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva pattacīvaramādāya senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikarontova cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ gantvā,
atk-abh02a11:82_10: sace buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṁ hoti taṁ avissajjetvāva cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ pavisati,
atk-abh02a11:82_11: aññaṁ ce kammaṭṭhānaṁ hoti sopānamūle ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṁ viya taṁ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṁ
atk-abh02a11:82_12: pītiṁ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ āruyha mahantaṁ cetiyaṁ ce,
atk-abh02a11:82_13: tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:82_15: tatheva padakkhiṇaṁ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:82_16: Cetiyaṁ vanditvā bodhiyaṅgaṇaṁ pattenāpi buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccākāraṁ dassetvā bodhi vanditabbā.
atk-abh02a11:83_0: So evaṁ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā,
atk-abh02a11:83_2: nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva cīvaraṁ pārupitvā gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-abh02a11:83_3: Atha naṁ manussā disvā ‘ayyo no āgato’ti paccuggantvā pattaṁ gahetvā āsanasālāya vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā
atk-abh02a11:83_4: yāguṁ datvā yāva bhattaṁ na niṭṭhāti tāva pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā purato nisīditvā pañhaṁ vā pucchanti
atk-abh02a11:83_6: Sacepi na kathāpenti “janasaṅgahatthaṁ dhammakathā nāma kātabbāyevā”ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti.
atk-abh02a11:83_8: Tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva āhāraṁ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṁ vatvā nivattiyamānehipi manussehi anugatova
atk-abh02a11:83_9: gāmato nikkhamitvā tattha te nivattetvā maggaṁ paṭipajjati.
atk-abh02a11:84_0: Atha naṁ puretaraṁ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti.
atk-abh02a11:84_2: amhākaṁ ācariyo’ti na mukhaṁ oloketvā vattaṁ karonti,
atk-abh02a11:84_9: yaṁ mātāpitūhipi dukkaraṁ taṁ ete manussā amhākaṁ karonti.
atk-abh02a11:84_13: Edisā nāma amhākaṁ upakārino natthī”ti tesaṁ guṇe kathento gacchati.
atk-abh02a11:85_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṁ vattapaṭipattiṁ karontassa kammajatejo pajjalati,
atk-abh02a11:85_4: so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasāva cetiyaṁ vanditvā gorūpānaṁ nikkhamanavelāyameva gāmaṁ yāgubhikkhāya
atk-abh02a11:85_5: pavisitvā yāguṁ labhitvā āsanasālaṁ gantvā pivati.
atk-abh02a11:85_6: Athassa dvattikkhattuṁ ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejodhātu upādinnakaṁ muñcitvā anupādinnakaṁ gaṇhāti,
atk-abh02a11:85_7: ghaṭasatena nhāto viya tejodhātupariḷāhanibbānaṁ patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṁ paribhuñjitvā pattañca
atk-abh02a11:85_8: mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena
atk-abh02a11:85_9: āhāraṁ paribhuñjitvā tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ upaṭṭhahamānaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvāva āgacchati.
atk-abh02a11:85_11: Edisā ca bhikkhū yāguṁ pivitvā vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā buddhasāsane arahattaṁ pattā nāma gaṇanapathaṁ vītivattā.
atk-abh02a11:85_12: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāya na taṁ āsanaṁ atthi,
atk-abh02a11:85_13: yattha yāguṁ pivitvā arahattaṁ pattā bhikkhū natthīti.
atk-abh02a11:86_0: Yo pamādavihārī hoti nikkhittadhuro sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetokhīlavinibandhabaddhacitto viharanto
atk-abh02a11:86_1: ‘kammaṭṭhānaṁ nāma atthī’tipi saññaṁ akatvā gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena gihīsaṁsaggena saṁsaṭṭho
atk-abh02a11:86_2: caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho nikkhamati –
atk-abh02a11:87_0: Yo panāyaṁ “harati ca paccāharati cā”ti vutto,
atk-abh02a11:87_2: atthakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasampi vīsampi tiṁsampi cattārīsampi paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṁ katvā viharanti – “āvuso,
atk-abh02a11:87_7: Tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṁ gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha. Ṭhāne,
atk-abh02a11:88_0: Te evaṁ katikavattaṁ katvā bhikkhācāraṁ gacchantā,
atk-abh02a11:88_7: So ‘ayaṁ bhikkhu tuyhaṁ uppannaṁ vitakkaṁ jānāti,
atk-abh02a11:88_8: ananucchavikaṁ te eta’nti attānaṁ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā ariyabhūmiṁ okkamati.
atk-abh02a11:88_10: Athassa pacchato āgacchantopi nisīdatīti so eva nayo.
atk-abh02a11:88_11: Ariyabhūmiṁ okkamituṁ asakkontopi taṁ kilesaṁ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikarontova gacchati,
atk-abh02a11:88_15: So kira ekūnavīsati vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pūrento eva vihāsi.
atk-abh02a11:88_16: Manussāpi antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā theraṁ tathāgacchantaṁ disvā “ayaṁ thero punappunaṁ nivattitvā gacchati,
atk-abh02a11:88_17: kiṁ nu kho maggamūḷho udāhu kiñci pamuṭṭho”ti samullapanti.
atk-abh02a11:88_18: So taṁ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva samaṇadhammaṁ karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-abh02a11:88_19: Arahattapattadivase cassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṁ adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṁ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-abh02a11:88_20: Cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṁ āgamiṁsu.
atk-abh02a11:88_21: Tañca obhāsaṁ disvā vanavāsī mahātissatthero taṁ dutiyadivase pucchi –
atk-abh02a11:88_24: Thero vikkhepaṁ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti,
atk-abh02a11:89_1: Sopi kira gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pūrento ‘paṭhamaṁ tāva bhagavato mahāpadhānaṁ pūjessāmī’ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāsi;
atk-abh02a11:89_2: puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pūretvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-abh02a11:89_3: So kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṁ uddharanto vippayuttena cittena uddhate pāde paṭinivattento gāmasīmaṁ gantvā ‘gāvī nu kho,
atk-abh02a11:89_4: pabbajito nu kho’ti āsaṅkanīyappadese ṭhatvā cīvaraṁ pārupitvā kacchakantarato udakena pattaṁ dhovitvā udakagaṇḍūsaṁ karoti.
atk-abh02a11:89_6: ‘Mā me bhikkhaṁ dātuṁ vā vandituṁ vā āgate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenāpi kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosī’ti. ‘Ajja, bhante,
atk-abh02a11:89_7: katimī’ti divasaṁ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṁ vā pañhaṁ vā pucchito pana udakaṁ gilitvā āroceti;
atk-abh02a11:90_0: Kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsa bhikkhū viya ca.
atk-abh02a11:90_3: Gāmañca piṇḍāya pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṁ katvā pavisiṁsu,
atk-abh02a11:90_9: ‘kinnu kho ete amheheva saddhiṁ na sallapanti udāhu aññamaññampi?
atk-abh02a11:90_12: etha ne aññamaññaṁ khamāpessāmā’ti sabbe vihāraṁ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhūsu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṁsu.
atk-abh02a11:90_13: Tato yo tesu cakkhumā puriso so āha – “na, bho,
atk-abh02a11:90_19: Tepi bhikkhū antotemāseyeva arahattaṁ patvā mahāpavāraṇāya visuddhipavāraṇaṁ pavāresuṁ.
atk-abh02a11:91_1: kalambutitthavihāre vassūpagatabhikkhū viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṁ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṁ
atk-abh02a11:91_2: gantvā udakagaṇḍūsaṁ katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo
atk-abh02a11:91_5: Tattha piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya javena gacchati,
atk-abh02a11:91_6: na hi javanapiṇḍapātikadhutaṅgaṁ nāma kiñci atthi,
atk-abh02a11:91_7: visamabhūmibhāgappattaṁ pana udakasakaṭaṁ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati,
atk-abh02a11:91_8: anugharaṁ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṁ vā adātukāmaṁ vā sallakkhetuṁ tadanurūpaṁ kālaṁ āgamento bhikkhaṁ gahetvā
atk-abh02a11:91_9: antogāme vā bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā,
atk-abh02a11:91_12: akkhabbhañjanavaṇālepanaputtamaṁsūpamavasena paccavekkhanto aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṁ āhāraṁ āhāreti neva davāya,
atk-abh02a11:91_17: Bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṁ katvā muhuttaṁ bhattakilamathaṁ paṭippassambhetvā yathā purebhattaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:91_18: evaṁ pacchābhattaṁ purimayāmaṁ pacchimayāmañca kammaṭṭhānameva manasikaroti.
atk-abh02a11:92_3: no ce paṭhamavaye pāpuṇāti atha majjhimavaye,
atk-abh02a11:92_4: no ce majjhimavaye pāpuṇāti atha pacchimavaye,
atk-abh02a11:92_5: no ce pacchimavaye pāpuṇāti atha maraṇasamaye,
atk-abh02a11:92_6: no ce maraṇasamaye pāpuṇāti atha devaputto hutvā,
atk-abh02a11:92_7: no ce devaputto hutvā pāpuṇāti anuppanne buddhe nibbatto paccekabodhiṁ sacchikaroti,
atk-abh02a11:92_8: no ce paccekabodhiṁ sacchikaroti atha buddhānaṁ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño vā hoti –
atk-abh02a11:92_28: Iti imasmiṁ catukke yvāyaṁ harati ca paccāharati ca,
atk-abh02a11:93_2: idha bhikkhu abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhabālaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu ‘attā abhikkamati,
atk-abh02a11:93_5: tathā asammuyhanto ‘abhikkamāmī’ti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṁ cittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātu viññattiṁ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a11:93_6: Iti cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṁ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāto abhikkamati.
atk-abh02a11:93_7: Tassevaṁ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-abh02a11:93_10: Vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-abh02a11:93_12: tathā sannikkhepanasannirujjhanesu tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṁ na pāpuṇanti;
atk-abh02a11:93_17: tattha tattheva pabbaṁ pabbaṁ sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilaṁ viya paṭapaṭāyantā bhijjanti.
atk-abh02a11:94_0: Aññaṁ uppajjate cittaṁ, aññaṁ cittaṁ nirujjhati;
atk-abh02a11:97_0: Niṭṭhito abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotītipadassa attho.
atk-abh02a11:98_0: Ālokite vilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṁ nāma purato pekkhanaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:98_2: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato pekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti.
atk-abh02a11:98_5: Iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevāti.
atk-abh02a11:99_0: Tattha ‘ālokessāmī’ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggaṇhanaṁ ‘sātthakasampajaññaṁ’.
atk-abh02a11:99_1: Taṁ āyasmantaṁ nandaṁ kāyasakkhiṁ katvā veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:100_3: sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṁ disaṁ āloketi –
atk-abh02a11:100_4: ‘evaṁ me puratthimaṁ disaṁ ālokayato na abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssavissantī’ti.
atk-abh02a11:100_11: sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṁ anuviloketi –
atk-abh02a11:101_0: Apica idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh02a11:102_2: kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanavilokanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:103_0: Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi.
atk-abh02a11:103_1: ‘Ālokessāmī’ti pana citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṁ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṁ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a11:103_2: Iti cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravasena heṭṭhimaṁ akkhidalaṁ adho sīdati,
atk-abh02a11:103_5: Tato cakkhuviññāṇaṁ dassanakiccaṁ sādhentaṁ uppajjatī’ti evaṁ pajānanaṁ panettha ‘asammohasampajaññaṁ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a11:107_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṁ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṁ sādhayamānaṁ pavattati;
atk-abh02a11:107_8: ayaṁ puriso’ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṁ na hoti;
atk-abh02a11:108_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthagate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṁ sakasakakiccanipphādanavasena āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṁ uppajjati.
atk-abh02a11:108_1: Taṁ pubbe uppannānaṁ āvajjanādīnaṁ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti.
atk-abh02a11:108_2: Tassa yathā paragehe kiñci yācituṁ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesupi tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṁ na yuttaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:108_3: evaṁ āvajjanādīnaṁ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṁ ayuttanti.
atk-abh02a11:109_0: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti,
atk-abh02a11:109_1: tāni saddhiṁ sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti,
atk-abh02a11:109_2: aññamaññaṁ na passantīti ittarāni tāvakālikāni honti.
atk-abh02a11:109_3: Tattha yathā ekasmiṁ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekakassa taṅkhaṇaṁyeva maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma,
atk-abh02a11:109_4: evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇaṁññeva maraṇadhammassa
atk-abh02a11:109_5: javanassāpi rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti.
atk-abh02a11:110_1: Ettha hi cakkhu ceva rūpāni ca rūpakkhandho,
atk-abh02a11:110_6: Evametesaṁ pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati.
atk-abh02a11:111_4: Evametesaṁ catunnaṁ āyatanānaṁ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati.
atk-abh02a11:112_4: Evametāsaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati.
atk-abh02a11:114_1: Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṁ akatvā hatthapādānaṁ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṁ pariggahetvā
atk-abh02a11:114_3: Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṁ samiñjitvā vā pasāretvā eva vā ṭhitassa khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti,
atk-abh02a11:114_7: kāle samiñjantassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā nuppajjanti,
atk-abh02a11:115_0: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṁ pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṁ ‘sappāyasampajaññaṁ’.
atk-abh02a11:116_3: Tatreko daharo hatthaṁ pasārento kāyasaṁsaggaṁ patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto.
atk-abh02a11:116_4: Aparo bhikkhu pādaṁ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi.
atk-abh02a11:116_10: Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā sappāye pasāretabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:117_1: mahāthero kira divāṭṭhāne nisinno antevāsikehi saddhiṁ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṁ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṁ samiñjesi.
atk-abh02a11:117_3: sahasā hatthaṁ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṁ samiñjitthā”ti?
atk-abh02a11:117_6: na me kammaṭṭhānaṁ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo.
atk-abh02a11:117_7: Idāni pana me tumhehi saddhiṁ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṁ muñcitvā samiñjito.
atk-abh02a11:117_8: Tasmā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesi”nti. “Sādhu, bhante,
atk-abh02a11:118_0: ‘Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjento vā pasārento vā natthi.
atk-abh02a11:119_0: Saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇeti ettha saṅghāṭicīvarānaṁ nivāsanapārupanavasena pattassa bhikkhāpaṭiggahaṇādivasena paribhogo ‘dhāraṇaṁ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a11:119_1: Tattha saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇe tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca piṇḍāya carato “āmisalābho sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā
atk-abh02a11:119_2: nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho ‘attho’ nāma.
atk-abh02a11:120_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṁ sukhumaṁ sappāyaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:120_6: Tādisañhi araññe ekakassa nivāsantarāyakaraṁ jīvitantarāyakarañcāpi hoti.
atk-abh02a11:121_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṁ pārupanto natthi.
atk-abh02a11:121_10: Tasmā neva sundaraṁ cīvaraṁ labhitvā somanassaṁ kātabbaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:121_12: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūpavatthādīhi sakkāraṁ karonti,
atk-abh02a11:121_14: Na tehi nāgavammikarukkhādayo somanassaṁ vā domanassaṁ vā karonti.
atk-abh02a11:121_15: Evameva neva sundaraṁ cīvaraṁ labhitvā somanassaṁ kātabbaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:122_0: Pattadhāraṇepi pattaṁ sahasāva aggahetvā ‘imaṁ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṁ labhissāmī’ti evaṁ pattaggahaṇapaccayā
atk-abh02a11:122_6: Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyova cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo.
atk-abh02a11:123_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṁ gaṇhanto natthi.
atk-abh02a11:124_0: Apica yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe anāthasālāyaṁ
atk-abh02a11:124_1: anāthamanusse disvā dayālukā purisā tesaṁ vaṇabandhapaṭṭacoḷakāni ceva kapālādīhi ca bhesajjāni upanāmenti.
atk-abh02a11:124_2: Tattha coḷakānipi kesañci saṇhāni kesañci thūlāni pāpuṇanti.
atk-abh02a11:124_3: Bhesajjakapālakānipi kesañci susaṇṭhānāni kesañci dussaṇṭhānāni pāpuṇanti.
atk-abh02a11:124_4: Na te tattha sumanā vā honti dummanā vā.
atk-abh02a11:124_7: Evameva yo bhikkhu vaṇacoḷakaṁ viya cīvaraṁ,
atk-abh02a11:124_9: kapāle bhesajjamiva ca patte laddhabhikkhaṁ sallakkheti –
atk-abh02a11:125_4: Tattha “neva davāyā”tiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi attho ‘attho’ nāma.
atk-abh02a11:126_0: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa aphāsu hoti,
atk-abh02a11:127_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi.
atk-abh02a11:127_2: Cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte otāraṇaṁ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:127_12: Iti naṁ tattha aggajivhāya tanukakheḷo mūlajivhāya bahalakheḷo makkheti.
atk-abh02a11:127_13: Taṁ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattitaṁ kheḷaudakatemitaṁ uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṁ koci kaṭacchunā
atk-abh02a11:127_14: vā dabbiyā vā anto pavesento nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a11:127_16: Paviṭṭhaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ koci palālasanthāraṁ katvā dhārento nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a11:127_18: Ṭhitaṁ ṭhitaṁ koci uddhanaṁ katvā aggiṁ jāletvā pacanto nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a11:127_20: Pakkaṁ pakkaṁ koci daṇḍakena vā yaṭṭhiyā vā bahi nīhārako nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a11:127_22: Iti vāyodhātu atiharati ca vītiharati ca dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca.
atk-abh02a11:127_23: Pathavīdhātu dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca.
atk-abh02a11:129_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe.
atk-abh02a11:129_1: Tattha pakkakāle uccārapassāvaṁ akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti,
atk-abh02a11:129_5: karontassa pana sabbaṁ taṁ na hotīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh02a11:130_0: Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṁ karontassa pana āpatti hoti,
atk-abh02a11:130_3: patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṁ taṁ na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:131_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci uccārapassāvakammaṁ karonto natthi.
atk-abh02a11:131_2: Yathā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṁ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-abh02a11:131_3: yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṁ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-abh02a11:131_4: evaṁ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi nikkhamanti.
atk-abh02a11:131_5: So panāyaṁ evaṁ nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano hoti na parassa;
atk-abh02a11:131_8: Yathā udakatumbhato purāṇaudakaṁ chaḍḍentassa neva taṁ attano hoti na paresaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:133_1: eko hi bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṁ cintento aññaṁ vitakkento gacchati.
atk-abh02a11:133_5: sayanto aññaṁ cintento aññaṁ vitakkento sayati.
atk-abh02a11:134_0: Ettakena pana na pākaṭaṁ hotīti caṅkamena dīpayiṁsu.
atk-abh02a11:134_1: Yo hi bhikkhu caṅkamanaṁ otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṁ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti;
atk-abh02a11:134_2: ‘pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṁ pavattā rūpārūpadhammā pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiṁ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
atk-abh02a11:134_3: pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṁ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṁ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
atk-abh02a11:134_4: caṅkamanavemajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
atk-abh02a11:134_5: caṅkamane pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṁ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
atk-abh02a11:134_7: nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṁ appatvā ettheva niruddhā’ti evaṁ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva bhavaṅgaṁ otāreti;
atk-abh02a11:134_9: ayaṁ bhikkhu gatādīsu sampajānakārī nāma hotīti.
atk-abh02a11:135_0: Evaṁ pana sutte kammaṭṭhānaṁ avibhūtaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a11:135_2: Tasmā yo bhikkhu yāva sakkoti tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṁ pariggahetvā sayati –
atk-abh02a11:135_10: Evaṁ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva cittaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ otāreti,
atk-abh02a11:136_1: Tattha ‘kiriyāmayapavattassa appavattiyā sati jāgaritaṁ nāma na hoti;
atk-abh02a11:136_2: kiriyāmayapavattavaḷañje pavattante jāgaritaṁ nāma hotī’ti pariggaṇhanto bhikkhu jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:136_3: Apica rattindivaṁ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:137_1: Tattha ‘upādārūpassa saddāyatanassa appavatte sati bhāsitaṁ nāma na hoti;
atk-abh02a11:137_2: tasmiṁ pavattante hotī’ti pariggāhako bhikkhu bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:137_3: Vimuttāyatanasīsena dhammaṁ desentopi bāttiṁsa tiracchānakathā pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitaṁ kathaṁ kathentopi bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:138_1: Tattha ‘upādārūpassa saddāyatanassa pavattiyaṁ sati tuṇhībhāvo nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a11:138_2: appavattiyaṁ hotī’ti pariggāhako bhikkhu tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:138_3: Aṭṭhatiṁsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā nisinnopi dutiyajjhānaṁ samāpannopi tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārīyeva nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:139_0: Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato.
atk-abh02a11:139_1: So heṭṭhā abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha bhikkhācāragāmaṁ gacchato ca āgacchato ca addhānagamanavasena kathito.
atk-abh02a11:139_2: Gate ṭhite nisinneti ettha vihāre cuṇṇikapāduddhārairiyāpathavasena kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:141_1: Etassa bhikkhuno upāsanaṭṭhānaṁ yogapathaṁ sappāyasenāsanaṁ dasseti.
atk-abh02a11:141_2: Yassa hi abbhantare ettakā guṇā atthi,
atk-abh02a11:141_6: Evarūpassa hi araññavāso kāḷamakkaṭaacchataracchadīpimigādīnaṁ aṭavīvāsasadiso hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a11:141_8: Tassa hi araññavāsamūlako koci attho natthi;
atk-abh02a11:141_11: Yassa pana abbhantare ettakā guṇā atthi,
atk-abh02a11:141_13: So hi araññavāsaṁ nissāya vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṁ gaṇhitvā parinibbāti,
atk-abh02a11:141_17: Tasmā satthā evarūpassa bhikkhuno upāsanaṭṭhānaṁ yogapathaṁ sappāyasenāsanaṁ dassento so vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajatītiādimāha.
atk-abh02a11:141_19: Etameva hi atthaṁ dassetuṁ tañca anākiṇṇantiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:141_21: Tattha yassa senāsanassa sāmantā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi pabbatagahanaṁ vanagahanaṁ nadīgahanaṁ hoti,
atk-abh02a11:141_24: Yaṁ pana aḍḍhayojanikaṁ vā yojanikaṁ vā hoti –
atk-abh02a11:141_25: idaṁ dūratāya eva anākiṇṇaṁ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:142_1: Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:142_2: Tassa pabhedaṁ dassetuṁ mañco pīṭhantiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:142_17: Vihāroti samantā parihārapathaṁ antoyeva rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni dassetvā katasenāsanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:142_19: Pāsādoti dve kaṇṇikāni gahetvā kato dīghapāsādo.
atk-abh02a11:142_20: Aṭṭoti paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṁ iṭṭhakāhi kato bahalabhittiko catupañcabhūmiko patissayaviseso.
atk-abh02a11:142_23: Leṇanti pabbataṁ khaṇitvā vā pabbhārassa appahonakaṭṭhāne kuṭṭaṁ uṭṭhāpetvā vā katasenāsanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:142_24: Guhāti bhūmidari vā yattha rattindivaṁ dīpaṁ laddhuṁ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a11:142_26: Rukkhamūlanti rukkhassa heṭṭhā parikkhittaṁ vā aparikkhittaṁ vā.
atk-abh02a11:142_28: Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti ṭhapetvā vā etāni mañcādīni yattha bhikkhū sannipatanti,
atk-abh02a11:143_1: Sambhajatīti tattha abhirativasena anukkaṇṭhito suṭṭhu upeti.
atk-abh02a11:143_2: Sevatīti nivāsanavasena sevati nisevatīti anukkaṇṭhamāno sannisito hutvā sevati.
atk-abh02a11:144_2: tassa pabhedaṁ dassetuṁ araññaṁ rukkhamūlantiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:144_3: Tattha araññanti vinayapariyāyena tāva “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṁ arañña”nti āgataṁ.
atk-abh02a11:144_4: Suttantapariyāyena āraññikaṁ bhikkhuṁ sandhāya “āraññakaṁ nāma senāsanaṁ pañcadhanusatikapacchima”nti āgataṁ.
atk-abh02a11:144_6: Abhidhammo nippariyāyadesanāti abhidhammapariyāyena araññaṁ dassetuṁ nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlāti vuttaṁ;
atk-abh02a11:145_1: Rukkhamūlādīnaṁ pakatiyā ca suviññeyyabhāvato rukkhamūlaṁyeva rukkhamūlantiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:145_2: Apicettha rukkhamūlanti yaṁkiñci sītacchāyaṁ vivittaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:145_4: Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṁ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṁ ekaggaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a11:145_11: Evarūpaṁ kandaraṁ oruyha pānīyaṁ pivitvā gattāni sītaṁ katvā vālikaṁ ussāpetvā paṁsukūlacīvaraṁ paññapetvā
atk-abh02a11:145_12: nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṁ karoto cittaṁ ekaggaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a11:146_2: Tenevassa niddese “vanapatthanti dūrānametaṁ senāsanānaṁ adhivacana”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:146_3: Yasmā vā rukkhamūlādīsu idamevekaṁ bhājetvā dassitaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:146_4: tasmāssa nikkhepapaṭipāṭiyā niddesaṁ akatvā sabbapariyante niddeso katoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:146_8: Mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṁ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti,
atk-abh02a11:146_9: gacchagumbādīnampi upari palālaṁ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṁ karonti;
atk-abh02a11:146_11: Vanapatthaniddese salomahaṁsānanti yattha paviṭṭhassa lomahaṁso uppajjati;
atk-abh02a11:146_14: Na manussūpacārānanti kasanavapanavasena manussehi upacaritabbaṁ vanantaṁ atikkamitvā ṭhitānaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:148_2: tasmāssa niddese “yadeva taṁ appasaddaṁ tadeva taṁ appanigghosa”nti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:148_7: tadeva janasañcaraṇena ca janavādena ca virahitaṁ hoti,
atk-abh02a11:148_8: tasmāssa niddese “yadeva taṁ appanigghosaṁ tadeva taṁ vijanavāta”nti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:148_11: tenassa niddese “yadeva taṁ vijanavātaṁ tadeva taṁ manussarāhaseyyaka”nti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:148_13: Yasmā pana taṁ niyameneva manussarāhaseyyakaṁ hoti,
atk-abh02a11:148_14: tasmāssa niddese “yadeva taṁ manussarāhaseyyakaṁ tadeva taṁ paṭisallānasāruppa”nti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:149_3: Avasesaṁ pana sabbampi senāsanaṁ suññāgārena saṅgahitaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:150_1: Ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāyāti uparimaṁ sarīraṁ ujuṁ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭipādetvā.
atk-abh02a11:150_3: Athassa yā tesaṁ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṁ,
atk-abh02a11:150_5: Tāsu na uppajjamānāsu cittaṁ ekaggaṁ hoti,
atk-abh02a11:151_0: 536.Ujuko hoti kāyo ṭhito paṇihitoti idampi hi imamevatthaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:152_2: Teneva vuttaṁ “ayaṁ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā”ti.
atk-abh02a11:152_8: tena vuccati “parimukhaṁ sati”nti evaṁ paṭisambhidāyaṁ vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a11:153_3: abhijjhaṁ loke pahāyāti lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā loko.
atk-abh02a11:153_4: Tasmā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu rāgaṁ pahāya kāmacchandaṁ vikkhambhetvāti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh02a11:156_1: Byāpajjati iminā cittaṁ pūtikummāsādayo viya pakatiṁ jahatīti byāpādo.
atk-abh02a11:157_4: Santā hontīti ime dvepi dhammā nirodhasantatāya santā hontīti.
atk-abh02a11:158_0: 549.Ālokasaññīti rattimpi divāpi diṭṭhālokasañjānanasamatthāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya saññāya samannāgato.
atk-abh02a11:159_0: 550.Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato. Idaṁ ubhayaṁ ālokasaññāya upakārakattā vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:160_1: Vigatathinamiddhatāya pana ālokasaññāya niddesapadesu cattattātiādīni aññamaññavevacanāneva.
atk-abh02a11:160_9: Paṭimuñcato vā nissaṭṭhattā bhāvanābalena abhibhuyya nissaṭṭhattāti attho.
atk-abh02a11:162_1: Niddesepissa tiṇṇoti idaṁ vicikicchāya animuggabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:162_3: Nittiṇṇoti idaṁ bhāvanābalena abhibhuyya upaddave tiṇṇabhāvadassanavasena.
atk-abh02a11:163_2: Na kaṅkhatīti ‘ime nu kho kusalā’ti kaṅkhaṁ na uppādeti.
atk-abh02a11:163_3: Na vicikicchatīti te dhamme sabhāvato vinicchetuṁ na kicchati,
atk-abh02a11:163_5: Akathaṁkathī hotīti ‘kathaṁ nu kho ime kusalā’ti kathaṁkathāya rahito hoti.
atk-abh02a11:164_0: 562.Upakkileseti upakkilesabhūte. Te hi cittaṁ upagantvā kilissanti. Tasmā upakkilesāti vuccanti.
atk-abh02a11:165_0: 563.Paññāyadubbalīkaraṇeti yasmā ime nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṁ na denti,
atk-abh02a11:165_1: uppannā api aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca vā abhiññāyo upacchinditvā pātenti,
atk-abh02a11:165_4: uppannā ca paññā nirujjhatī’ti idampi hi imamevatthaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:165_5: Sesamettha sabbaṁ heṭṭhā tattha tattha pakāsitattā uttānatthameva.
atk-abh02a11:166_1: taṁ heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe rūpāvacaraniddese idheva ca tattha tattha vuttameva.
atk-abh02a11:166_2: Kevalañhi dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānaniddesesupi yathā tāni jhānāni heṭṭhā ‘tivaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ hoti,
atk-abh02a11:166_4: evaṁ avatvā “ajjhattaṁ sampasādana”ntiādivacanato pariyāyena sampasādādīhi saddhiṁ tāni aṅgāni gahetvā
atk-abh02a11:166_5: “jhānanti sampasādo pītisukhaṁ cittassekaggatā”tiādinā nayena taṁ taṁ jhānaṁ niddiṭṭhanti ayamettha viseso.
atk-abh02a11:167_0: 588.Yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhantītipadaniddese pana kiñcāpi ‘ācikkhanti desentī’tiādīni sabbāneva aññamaññavevacanāni,
atk-abh02a11:167_4: tena tena pakārena atthaṁ ṭhapetvā paṭṭhapenti,
atk-abh02a11:167_7: nikkujjitabhāvaṁ gambhīrabhāvañca nīharitvā vā sotūnaṁ ñāṇassa patiṭṭhaṁ janayantā uttāniṁ karonti,
atk-abh02a11:167_8: sabbehipi imehi ākārehi sotūnaṁ aññāṇandhakāraṁ vidhamentā pakāsentīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a11:168_0: Samatikkamaniddesepi tattha tattha tehi tehi dhammehi vuṭṭhitattā atikkamanto,
atk-abh02a11:171_1: Abhidhammabhājanīye heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe āgatanayeneva tanti ṭhapitā.
atk-abh02a11:171_2: Tasmā tattha sabbesampi kusalavipākakiriyavasena niddiṭṭhānaṁ jhānānaṁ tattha vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:174_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana tiṇṇaṁ jhānānaṁ nimittārammaṇattā parittārammaṇādibhāvena navattabbatā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a11:174_3: Lokuttarā panettha maggakāle phalakāle vā siyā appamāṇārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a11:174_4: Catutthaṁ jhānaṁ siyā parittārammaṇanti ettha kusalato terasa catutthajjhānāni sabbatthapādakacatutthaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:176_0: Iddhividhacatutthaṁ cittavasena kāyaṁ pariṇāmentassa adissamānena kāyena pāṭihāriyakaraṇe kāyārammaṇattā parittārammaṇaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:176_1: kāyavasena cittaṁ pariṇāmentassa dissamānena kāyena pāṭihāriyaṁ katvā brahmalokaṁ gacchantassa samāpatticittārammaṇattā mahaggatārammaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:178_3: Cetopariyañāṇalābhī pana puthujjano puthujjanānaṁyeva cittaṁ jānāti,
atk-abh02a11:182_4: “anāgate saṅkho nāma rājā bhavissatī”tiādinā nayena nāmagottānussaraṇakāle navattabbārammaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:185_0: Kiriyatopi tesaṁ dvādasannaṁ jhānānaṁ idameva ārammaṇavidhānaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:185_1: Tīṇi jhānāni namaggārammaṇāti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṁ vā cetopariyādiñāṇaṁ vā maggaṁ ārammaṇaṁ kareyya,
atk-abh02a11:185_4: vīriyajeṭṭhikāya vā vīmaṁsājeṭṭhikāya vā maggabhāvanāya maggādhipatino;
atk-abh02a11:186_0: Catutthaṁ jhānanti idhāpi kusalato terasasu catutthajjhānesu sabbatthapādakaiddhividhadibbasotadibbacakkhuyathākammūpagañāṇacatutthañceva
atk-abh02a11:186_7: chandacittajeṭṭhikāya ceva maggabhāvanāya phalakāle ca na vattabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:187_0: Tīṇi jhānāni na vattabbāti atītādīsu ekadhammampi ārabbha appavattito navattabbāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a11:188_0: Catutthaṁ jhānanti kusalato terasasu catutthajjhānesu sabbatthapādakacatutthaṁ navattabbārammaṇameva.
atk-abh02a11:188_8: Cetopariyañāṇacatutthaṁ atīte sattadivasabbhantare uppajjitvā niruddhacittajānanakāle atītārammaṇaṁ;
atk-abh02a11:188_10: “Yathā imassa bhoto manosaṅkhārā paṇihitā imassa cittassa anantarā amuṁ nāma vitakkaṁ vitakkessatīti.
atk-abh02a11:188_12: tatheva taṁ hoti no aññathā”ti iminā hi suttena cetopariyañāṇasseva pavatti pakāsitā.
atk-abh02a11:190_0: Tīṇijhānāni bahiddhārammaṇāti ajjhattato bahiddhābhūtaṁ nimittaṁ ārabbha pavattito bahiddhārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a11:191_0: Catutthaṁ jhānanti idhāpi kusalato terasasu catutthajjhānesu sabbatthapādakacatutthaṁ bahiddhārammaṇameva.
atk-abh02a11:192_0: Iddhividhacatutthaṁ kāyavasena cittapariṇāmanepi cittavasena kāyapariṇāmanepi attanova kāyacittārammaṇattā ajjhattārammaṇaṁ;
atk-abh02a11:195_1: parassa khandhānañceva nāmagottassa ca anussaraṇakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:198_1: parassa khandhānussaraṇakāle ceva nāmagottānussaraṇakāle ca bahiddhārammaṇaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:200_0: Lokuttaracatutthaṁ bahiddhārammaṇameva. Kiriyatopi dvādasasu jhānesu ayameva nayoti.
atk-abh02a11:201_0: Imasmiṁ pana jhānavibhaṅge sammāsambuddhena suttantabhājanīyepi lokiyalokuttaramissakāneva jhānāni kathitāni;
atk-abh02a11:201_2: Tayopi hi ete nayā tebhūmakadhammamissakattā ekaparicchedā eva.
atk-abh02a11:201_3: Evamayaṁ jhānavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṁ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
